text:
Getting following error during installation

bash: -c: line 1: syntax error near unexpected token `;'
*** Error code 2
make: Fatal error: Command failed for target `install-modules-yes'

Referred solution provided in 
https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=45361

Tried with the given fix but it is not working. Please help.
